name: Rashel Rojas
about_yourself: Hi! I'm a rising senior studying Computer Science with a track in Software Systems at Columbia University. I'm interested in Software Engineering - specifically, backend development. I enjoy strength training, bellydancing, and hanging out with friends. I'm interested in full-time software engineering jobs for Summer 2023.

education.name: Bronx Science

responsibilities.resp_1: Created a portfolio web application using Docker, Flask, Jinja, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
responsibilities.resp_2: Learned about various production engineering topics such as scripting, services, testing, containers, CI/CD integration, etc.

responsibilities.resp_1: Optimized storage system of a pre-trade analysis tool called Troodon, which generates and stores Bond Analysis Worksheets (BAWs) into a local folder used by the CLO Secondary Trading desk of 15 traders
responsibilities.resp_2: Created a Procmon script in Slang (GS proprietary language) to transfer BAWs older than 2 years from local to cloud storage in Goldman Sachsâ€™ main cloud storage system, OBS2
responsibilities.resp_3: Successful in freeing up hundreds of gigabytes of space, which came at a crucial time considering local storage was at 90% capacity and the recent uptick in CLO trading

responsibilities.resp_1: Worked under Babak Mozaffari on a team of 13 software engineers on the development of OpenShift / Kubernetes operators for Red Hat and upstream open-source products
responsibilities.resp_2: Implemented CR/CRD validation and ConsoleLink creation for 5 operators (3scale, Teiid, Apicurio, Hawtio, Syndesis) using Go and verified operator deployment via the OpenShift Container Platform
